contextId.information: This could be made clearer. AT: "When he arrived in Seirah" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
The words "to battle" are understood. AT: "so they might follow him to battle" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
The word "people" or "men" is understood. AT: "10,000 people remained" or "10,000 men remained" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
You can make clear the understood information. AT: "and asked for food there in the same way" or "and he also asked them for food" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
contextId.quote: and spoke to the people there in the same way
